entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
